title: Any alternate way to download LoL?
body: I give up, I tried downloading league since yesterday, my speed starts at the normal 720KB/s and then goes down to 10KB/s(sometimes even zero). It always gets to 2% done. I restarted the client a couple times(someone has solved that issue that way), I reinstalled it a couple time. Is there any other way to download LoL like a zip file(the entire game), I really wanna play. I tried everything that I found on the internet, even used to Hextech Repair Tool, but no help.

replies.body:
Let's try a couple different things really quickly.

First off, let's adjust a couple network settings that might be getting in the way. Adjust your Port Forwarding and DNS settings by following the steps outlined in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). This should be able to get you a clearer connection to our servers specifically.

Second, double check your OS's admin settings following the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions). The installer could be slowing down because it doesn't have access to the files it's trying to update.

Let me know if this doesn't help at all and we can dig a little deeper.

I am also having this same issue.  It's actually pathetic.  I've downloaded several other programs (davinci resolve, several adobe programs, ffxiv, about 500gb worth of other programs) as I just reformatted my computer.  I've gotten all of these programs in the 6 hours it's taken league to get to 56%.... 

Also my support ticket seemed to be of little help.  <3  I'm about to download dota2 and watch it be done before league gets to 60%.
